parameters.name: name
parameters.description: object name

parameters.name: refers_to
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid

parameters.name: referred_by
parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.

parameters.name: include_name
parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.

parameters.name: skip_default
parameters.description: Default values are not set.

parameters.name: join_subresources
parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

parameters.name: X-Avi-Version
parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.

parameters.name: X-CSRFToken
parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID
parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID

version.description: Protobuf version number. Gets incremented if there is se Diff of federated diff in config pbs.This field will be a monotonically increasing number indicating the number of Config Update operations. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

backup_scheduler_faults.description: Enable backup scheduler faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

cluster_faults.description: Enable cluster faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

deprecated_api_version_faults.description: Enable deprecated api version faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

license_faults.description: Enable license faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

migration_faults.description: Enable DB migration faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

sslprofile_faults.description: Enable SSL Profile faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

configpb_attributes.description: Protobuf versioning for config pbs. Field introduced in 21.1.1.

controller_faults.description: Configure controller faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

serviceengine_faults.description: Configure serviceengine faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

tenant_ref.description: Tenant. It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

uuid.description: UUID Auto generated. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

virtualservice_faults.description: Configure VirtualService faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

debug_faults.description: Enable debug faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.
Enable debug faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

pool_server_faults.description: Enable pool server faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

scaleout_faults.description: Enable VS scaleout and scalein faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

shared_vip_faults.description: Enable shared vip faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

ssl_cert_expiry_faults.description: Enable SSL certificate expiry faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.

ssl_cert_status_faults.description: Enable SSL certificate status faults. Field introduced in 20.1.6.
